NK080(wu)008:1: // rnal 'byor chen po shes rab spyan 'byed kyi man ngag ces bya ba bzhugs so //
NK080(wu)008:3: ma h+aa yo ga pradz+ny+aa pra be sha tsak+sha u pa de sha na ma /
NK080(wu)008:5: rnal 'byor chen po shes rab spyan 'byed kyi man ngag ces bya ba /
NK080(wu)008:6: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK080(wu)008:7: dkyil 'khor gtso bo skyes bu'i mchog dam pa lha phyir phyag 'tshal nas /
NK080(wu)008:8: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud don mchog /rang bzhin rkyen gyis mngon bya'i phyir //
NK080(wu)008:9: rgyud gsum snang ba rnal 'byor gsum //
NK080(wu)008:10: bya byed tshul gnyis bdag nyid dang //
NK080(wu)008:11: tshig don dang ni de nyid can //
NK080(wu)008:13: shes thob byed pa bar tshul la //
NK080(wu)008:14: ngo bo rkyen bshad thabs dang dbye //
NK080(wu)008:15: rim par mi brjod 'dir brjod pa //
NK080(wu)008:16: dang po bar mas mthar byed pa'i //
NK080(wu)008:17: lam gnyis thun mong rgyu dang mchog /mchog la phyi dang nang la'ang //
NK080(wu)008:18: thabs dang shes rab lam gnyis kyis //
NK080(wu)008:19: nges byed sngon la steng 'og thabs //
NK080(wu)008:20: gcig shos gcor byed spyi blugs rim //
NK080(wu)008:21: bzhi bral lngas dbul las bzlog pa yis //
NK080(wu)008:22: rnal 'byor che la mos rnams kyi //
NK080(wu)008:23: shi sha'i don phyir mdo tsam brjod //
NK080(wu)008:24: phun sum tshogs pa lhun grub rnams //
NK080(wu)008:25: gsang dbang mchog gis 'byed byed pa'o //
NK080(wu)008:26: sngon byas thabs mchog chags mchog don //
NK080(wu)008:27: sangs rgyas zhabs kyi gsungs par shes //
NK080(wu)008:28: thos bsam bsgoms pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis //
NK080(wu)008:29: rang byung kun ngam lhun grub phyir //
NK080(wu)008:30: gsum gyis grol byed lam bshad pa //
NK080(wu)008:31: mtshan nyid gsum la gcig gzhi gsum //
NK080(wu)008:32: gtso mchog mtshan nyid dang por bshad //
NK080(wu)008:33: lam kun gzungs su bya phyir ro //
NK080(wu)008:34: de la brtag bya thabs ngo bos //
NK080(wu)008:36: khyad par gol sa yon tan skyon //
NK080(wu)008:37: spyan mchog lus su rnam par bsgrags //
NK080(wu)008:38: 'ching grol byed pa lhun rdzogs kyang //
NK080(wu)008:39: dbang spyan mchog dang bral ba yis //
NK080(wu)008:40: srid gsum 'bras bu ming tsam snang //
NK080(wu)008:41: dang po chu bo bzhi rgal ltar //
NK080(wu)008:42: snang ba gcig la gnyis tshul snang //
NK080(wu)008:43: ngan shog bdag gzhan stod phur snang //
NK080(wu)008:44: de de rim pa grub ma grub //
NK080(wu)008:45: mtha'i don rnams cing 'gyur brtag /mthong byed thabs kyang rgyud pa dang //
NK080(wu)008:46: rtags kyis mchod cing gtan la 'bebs //
NK080(wu)008:47: dman la rgyu gsum goms pa yis //
NK080(wu)008:48: brtan nas brtags spyad klung zhugs mthong //
NK080(wu)008:49: bsgom pa lam du bstan par bya //
NK080(wu)008:50: rim par skye la the tshom med //
NK080(wu)008:51: shes bya dam pa rtags mtshon pa'ang //
NK080(wu)008:52: rang bzhin rtags dang 'bras bu'i rtags //
NK080(wu)008:53: dang po rang gi rigs pa yis //
NK080(wu)008:55: phyogs dang kha dog la sogs kyis //
NK080(wu)008:56: mtshon nas ji bzhin nyid rtogs byed //
NK080(wu)008:57: sems can ma lus thams cad la //
NK080(wu)008:58: ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang //
NK080(wu)008:59: rang gi rnam rtogs bsgribs byas te //
NK080(wu)008:60: ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong //
NK080(wu)008:61: ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la //
NK080(wu)008:62: ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)008:63: dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang //
NK080(wu)008:64: ljang gu la sogs nag por bstan //
NK080(wu)008:65: 'di yis lhun grub rtogs par ces //
NK080(wu)008:66: cig shos mthar phyin ye shes kyi //
NK080(wu)008:67: dkyil 'khor rten dang brten can ltar //
NK080(wu)008:68: snang ba'i gnas brgyad gdan sogs dang //
NK080(wu)008:69: rten cing rgya bzhi rgyan sogs mtshungs //
NK080(wu)008:70: gtan tshigs rgyas par lus bzhag na //
NK080(wu)008:71: tshan ma bka' gzhung gtan tshigs dang //
NK080(wu)008:72: sgra mthun don lpags gtan tshigs kyis //
NK080(wu)008:73: gzhal bya bdag nyid che sogs blta //
NK080(wu)008:74: tshad ma bka' la dag mnyam grangs //
NK080(wu)008:75: rtogs pa bzhi dang bden gsum dag /skabs kyis bya thabs mthar 'gyur yang //
NK080(wu)008:76: byed la gtsor brjod dag pa yis //
NK080(wu)008:77: snang ba mi spong 'bras bur byed //
NK080(wu)008:78: mnyam pas mnyam byed bdag nyid che //
NK080(wu)008:79: rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i gtan tshigs kyis //
NK080(wu)008:80: mi bzad rgyun gyi 'khor lor byed //
NK080(wu)008:81: bden pa gnyis med zung du 'jug /ldem dgongs man ngag gtan tshigs kyis //
NK080(wu)008:82: skabs kyis don nyid mthong bar byed //
NK080(wu)008:83: dngos po lo rgyus gtan tshigs kyis //
NK080(wu)008:84: bdag nyid chen po smos ci dgod //
NK080(wu)008:85: rang bzhin gtan tshigs lhun grub 'jug /
NK080(wu)008:86: 'on tang tha dad don la med //
NK080(wu)008:87: sgra mthun don lpags rang dang spyi //
NK080(wu)008:88: mtshan nyid gzhal mtha' bral ba'o //
NK080(wu)008:89: chos kun rang dang spyir btags pas //
NK080(wu)008:90: ma skyes thams cad mkhyen pa'i don //
NK080(wu)008:91: rnam pa kun ldan stong par snang //
NK080(wu)008:92: de phyir sku gsung thugs su snang //
NK080(wu)008:93: dngos kun gcig dang du mar bral //
NK080(wu)008:94: mtha' gsum dang nyid bzhi bral lugs //
NK080(wu)008:95: khyad par can gyis de nyid mthong //
NK080(wu)008:96: de yang ma spangs bral bar brjod //
NK080(wu)008:97: rnam par dbye dang mtshon pa'i dpe //
NK080(wu)008:98: de bzhin nyid du the tshom med //
NK080(wu)008:99: shes rab spyan gyis ngo bo skabs 'jug kyang //
NK080(wu)008:100: rgyu 'bras phyir na ci gshos la /
NK080(wu)008:101: yul med rang rig mngon sum pa'o //
NK080(wu)008:102: bye brag 'dod gzhung gtan tshigs kyis //
NK080(wu)008:103: zhor brjod bcu gsum rnam grangs tsam //
NK080(wu)008:104: mthong byed nges tshig mthong lta gnyis //
NK080(wu)008:105: sgros bral skur med don chen po //
NK080(wu)008:106: sa lu phub khrod snang med bzhin //
NK080(wu)008:107: yul med rang gsal nyams rnyed la //
NK080(wu)008:108: mthong zhes tha snyad brjod par 'ang //
NK080(wu)008:109: de phyir blta dang blta med pas //
NK080(wu)008:110: chos kun rang rig nyid snang ba //
NK080(wu)008:111: me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du //
NK080(wu)008:112: mi rtog gsal bas nges tshig 'grub //
NK080(wu)008:113: de ltar skyes mchog su ldan pa //
NK080(wu)008:114: dam la rub cing snying rjer ldan //
NK080(wu)008:115: pha la drin skyes man ngag 'ache'o //
NK080(wu)008:116: mi skyon don brtson chags bral 'byung //
NK080(wu)008:117: spyod zhib nyam nga g.yang sa med //
NK080(wu)008:118: de yod dmigs dang ldan pa'i rtags //
NK080(wu)008:119: rnal 'byor che la phyir rgyu dang //
NK080(wu)008:120: mu stegs zhor 'byung rig byed dang //
NK080(wu)008:121: ngo bo rgyur smra phyogs lung rten //
NK080(wu)008:122: bdun sde mnyam 'jog la sogs kyis //
NK080(wu)008:123: reg min de las gzhi nas spags //
NK080(wu)008:124: lta spyod mi mthun smos ci dgos //
NK080(wu)008:125: bskal par sbyangs pas don mthong ba //
NK080(wu)008:126: phyin chad mi ldog sa la gnas //
NK080(wu)008:127: spyod sogs las kun pha rol phyin //
NK080(wu)008:128: gzungs kyi dam par rgyal bas gsungs //
NK080(wu)008:129: shes rab spyan dang ma ldan na //
NK080(wu)008:130: dkar phyogs lha yi stegs tsam las //
NK080(wu)008:132: nag po'i las spyod smos ci dgos //
NK080(wu)008:133: tshig tsam lta la rten byed cing //
NK080(wu)008:134: dam med spyod cing sgom dgu yi //
NK080(wu)008:135: nyon pa byed de thar par dka' //stegs dbang tsam gyis rnyed dka' bas //
NK080(wu)008:137: de med nam yang thar mi srid //
NK080(wu)008:138: spyod dang skyon bcos mi gzod cing //
NK080(wu)008:139: lci dang gdung med 'dod thob nas //
NK080(wu)008:140: mi khur spongs byed rigs ma nges //
NK080(wu)008:141: ltung byed de dang ma phrad cig /de bzlog snod
NK080(wu)008:142: ldan dpal du shog /des kyang de bzhin 'tsho bar
NK080(wu)008:143: shog /rab rib sel byed thur 'dra ba'i //
NK080(wu)008:144: dman phyir brtson byas gzhung 'gal skyon //
NK080(wu)008:145: rgyal ba rigs 'dzin mchog gsum la //
NK080(wu)008:146: bzod gsol gnyis med ngang du bshags //
NK080(wu)008:147: ngal ba'i dge rtsas 'gro ba rnams //
NK080(wu)008:148: mi ldog spyan ldan sangs rgyas shog /rdo rje sems
NK080(wu)008:149: dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i bshes pa'i mtshan nyid bshad
NK080(wu)008:150: pa / shes rab spyan 'byed ces bya ba /
